Texts.Eng:
The irken are a proud race of insectiod lifeforms. Despite their size, they are expansionist invaders. They are loyal to their tyrannical leaders.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;0.3^reset;% Health Regen
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;30^reset;% Fire & Madness, +^green;15^reset;% Electric & Cosmic
  Energy x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;8^reset;% Speed & Jump

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Energy: +^green;25^reset;% Damage
  Pistols: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;
  Assault Rifles: Damage x^green;1.2^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.9^reset;
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Ice, -^red;20^reset;% Poison, -^red;10^reset;% Physical
  Defense x^red;0.4^reset;, Health x^red;0.75^reset; in cold biomes
  ^red;Lose health regen bonus in cold biomes^reset;
